subject: Re: Alcatraz
author: itcdeadpeople
full_text:
You could hack a 20-125 for under $45.  It has a built-in speaker, so unlike the 12-469 or 
the 12-820, you wouldn't have to worry about adding one in order to hear.  Though I can 
certainly understand what it's like to not have an extra $45 to spend.  ;-)

Margaret

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "darkstarwolf2002" <darkstarwolf2002@...> wrote:
>
> quick question to anyone who may have info on area's of interest 
> regarding Alcatraz. We will be doing a investigation there starting may 
> 17th.. unfortunatly no box yet. It would be a  pretty cool experience 
> if we had one to experiment with but lol being broke all of our money 
> will be going towards the investigation
>
